column4: ma gya nhyew wo odum ndua."

column5: osiandɛ enyimnyamfo no asɛɛ: ao hom Basan nsudur
column7: na kwaa dzendzen no aba famu."

column2: "Nguanhwɛfo ewuotwa ne gyegyee nye no! Na hɔn enyimnyam asɛɛ: ngyatafɔr pɔw ne gyegyee nye no osiandɛ Jordan ahohyehyɛ asɛɛ."
"Mbrɛ EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn se nye yi: Hom nnyɛn okum nguankuw no a"

column4: na wonndzi so; na hɔn a wɔtɔn hɔn no ka dɛ
column6: na menya moho: na hɔnankasa hɔn ahwɛfo no nnhu hɔn mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Na merennda ho nnya asaase no do atsefo no ho tsimbɔbɔr bio
column5: mibeyi obiara ahyɛ ne nyɛnko nsa
column6: na ne hen nsa: na wɔbɔbobɔ asaase no

column3: nguankuw no mu dza wɔyɛ mbɔbɔr no. Na mefaa mpoma ebien; mefrɛɛ kor Enyimpa
column4: na mefrɛɛ kor so Nkabɔmu; na menyɛɛn nguankuw no."

column2: "Na mutwaa nguanhwɛfo baasa no kyenee wɔ bosoom kor mu; osiandɛ hɔn ho foon me kra
column3: na mo so mo ho foon hɔn kra."

column4: ma onwu; na dza wotwa no kyen no
column5: wontwa no nkyen; na hɔn a aka no
column6: obiara ndzi ne nyɛnko ne nam."

column2: "Na mefaa mo poma Enyimpa no na mutwaa mu
column3: dɛ moroto m'ahyɛmu a menye aman nyina edzi no."

column2: "Na wɔtoo no da no ara: na nguankuw no mu abɔbɔfo a wɔhwɛɛ me no wohun dɛ ɔyɛ EWURADZE asɛm ampa."

column3: Sɛ oye wɔ hom adwen mu a
column4: hom mma me m'apaabɔdze; na sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a
column5: hom mma ɔnka. Nna wokeer m'akatua ndwetɛbona eduasa maa me."

column4: enyimnyam bo a woetwa no me tsir no. Na mefaa ndwetɛbona eduasa no
ama maasɛɛ Juda na Israel ntamu enuayɛ no."

column3: Nkyii so bio fa guanhwɛfo kwasea no n'edwindadze no."

column4: mebɛma guanhwɛfo bi do wɔ asaase do a ɔrennsera hɔn a woetwa hɔn akyen no
column5: eso ɔronnhwehwɛ hɔn a wɔapetse no
column6: na ɔrennsa dza ebubu no yarba; eso ɔrennyɛn dza ɔtse apɔw no
column7: na mbom obedzi dza adɔ angoa ne nam
column8: na ɔapaapaa no n'anansa mu esinesin."

column2: "Oguanhwɛfo gyangyan a ɔdan nguan no gya no
column4: na n'enyiwa nyimfa do: ne basa bɛkyenkyen
